short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A hover over dictionary for Dutch! Press shift while hovering over a Dutch word to show the definition.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A hover (mouse over) dictionary for Dutch. Hover over a Dutch word while pressing shift to see a definition popup. The definition popup can be closed by clicking outside of the popup. You can also look up words on the popup itself. Works well with YouTube subtitles, too!
